content:
@Vlad Korobov what do you think about putting this functionality in the send later menu? We'd want to change the tooltip for the triple dot menu, but here's what it could look like:

254400484-29ed6094-3015-4788-848f-607ba0ca6fb5.gif
You can also play with the PR #22104
I love this idea...I often navigate away from drafting a message to fix one little thing, and having to open drafts, select what I was working on, etc. is a bit of a pain
I put up this PR first in June 2022 because it feels like a really helpful change for a lot of users!! Hope that it can get prioritized soon.
Sure, once we update the compose box it should point to drafts link in the compose box
What do you mean by point to?
What do you want to reference the drafts link in what way?

You have "saved as drafts" tooltip pointing to the item in the left side bar. In the redesigned compose box the "Drafts" link is in compose box, the same place where people create messages :smile:
image.png
Ah yes! That's mostly unrelated to the change I have here (I didn't add the tooltip for the left bar) but it would make this a better experience :)
